title: OpCo's Gheit Sees $65 As Long-Term Sustainable Oil Price(Audio)
itunes:title: OpCo's Gheit Sees $65 As Long-Term Sustainable Oil Price(Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Fadel Gheit, Senior Analyst at Oppenheimer & Co, for a look at the oil markets and impact of Saudi terrorist attacks.
